name: (Limited Edition) Iron Kingdom CASSETTES!
description:
Here we are selling both 'Curse of the Voodoo Queen' and 'Gates of Eternity' on the glorious and highly superior format known as the CASSETTE!

Only 100 copies of each album have been printed!

If you'd like to purchase just one album on cassette then message Iron Kingdom at: iron_kingdom@hotmail.com 
and we will set you up!

name: CD - 'Gates of Eternity' ALBUM (2013)
description:
Iron Kingdom's 2nd Full length CD 'Gates of Eternity' schedualed to be release on April 26th/2013.  The Cd is in a jewel case with an 8 page booklet including lyrics & photos, with 9 Tracks of pure Heavy Metal Madness!

Track Listing:
1.) At the Gates
2.) Chains of Solitude
3.) Demon of Deception
4.) Candeloro
5.) Guardian Angel
6.) At Home in the Dark
7.) Crowned in Iron
8.) Egypt (The End is Near)
9.) Shadow of Death

Total Running Length: 57 Minutes

Rated 9/10 by Rock Hard (Germany) - ''Gates Of Eternity" could prove to be one of the most important discoveries in 2013 for U.S. Metal lovers.''

Sound the Charge (Scotland) - ''sometimes you just want some glorious old school metal that makes you want to batter a dragon to death. Iron Kingdom are said band and from the opening track, At The Gates, I’m sold. When we reach Crowned In Iron we truly reach old school metal at its finest''

Metal Mellowdee - ''Immediately noticeable is that the recording seems to cherish a vintage feel, which delightfully contributes to the album’s ambiance. "Gates of Eternity" should keep listeners on edge and anticipating future projects from Iron Kingdom.''

name: CD - 'Curse of The Voodoo Queen' ALBUM (2011)
description:
This is the debut album of IRON KINGDOM!  Full colour 8 page booklet, jewel case, pure and true heavy metal!!  

Track Listing:

1) The Ritual
2) Voodoo Queen
3) Legions Of Metal
4) Unleash The Kraken
5) The Heretic
6) From the Ashes
7) Fired Up
8) The Nightrider
9) Lord Of The Twilight
10) Montezuma

10 Tracks with a total running time of...  48:25

Metal Titans (Canada) - ''I want an Iron Kingdom/Voodoo Queen Baseball Tee so I can blast this album and try to sing along, banging my head and driving to the stadium in my Trans Am to drink cans of Bud in the parking lot before the Iron Kingdom show! Fuck I wish it was the 80's right now. ''

name: T-Shirt - (Full Colour) 'Gates of Eternity'
description:
Shirts from our 2nd full length album, 'Gates of Eternity'

Front: Full colour image of the album cover

Back: Track listing

Available In: SMALL, MEDIUM, LARGE, X-LARGE, and XX-LARGE

Also available for Women in a Fitted style, 

Fitted Sizes Available: SMALL, MEDIUM, LARGE, and X-LARGE

name: Baseball Shirt - (Full Colour) 'Gates of Eternity'
description:
White body w/Black Sleeves baseball shirt with a full colour image of the Hell Guardian from the 'Gates of Eternity' Album cover.

Available In: SMALL, MEDIUM, LARGE, X-LARGE, and XX-LARGE
